name: NookBot
0:
”Alexa ask nook bot price of red snapper”
”Alexa ask nook bot price of atlas moth”
”Alexa ask nook bot price of gold”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nook bot
des: For use with the Nintendo Switch video game Animal Crossing New Horizons. When you catch a fish or bug ask Nook Bot for the price and Nook Bot will reply with the price in bells. Also has prices for sea creatures, shells, and flowers. Developed by animalcrossingprices.com
